colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES 'JAM MGON BLA MA YAB SRAS CHOS RGYAL RIGS LDAN RNAMS DANG BCAS PA'I PHYAG MCHOD CHO GA 'KHYER BDE GNAD TSANG BTZON 'DON CANG SHES ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DANG GUS RNAM DPYOD CAN GYI BU SLOB RTZIS RAMS PA NGAG DBANG BRTZON 'GRUS DANG DGE SLONG AA PA RI DZA TA GNYIS KYIS SO SO NAS RAB DKAR LHA RDZAS DANG RTEN 'BREL 'GRIG PA'I DNGOS 'BUL DANG BCAS TE NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA BZHIN, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN GZUGS 'JAM DBYANGS DGYES PA'I BSHES GNYEN GYIS DPAL GDONG LO'I SKAR MA SMIN DRUG GIS NYA PA'I NYIN DGE BAR CHOS SDE CHOS DBYINGS 'OD GSAL GLING GI NYE 'DABS KYI BSTI GNAS BRAG SER KHROD DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG YUL DANG DUS MTHA'I BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA RGYA CHEN PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ` AOm SVASTI, SKYABSo MGONo BZHIo PA'Io THUGS RJE'I 'OD STONG GIS, ,DUS MTHAR RGYAL BSTAN 'DAB BRGYA BZHAD PA'I TSAL, ,CHOS GRVA BKRAo SHISo CHOSo 'BYORo GLINGo MCHOG NAS, ,SPAR GYI CHOS SBYIN SBRANG RTZI'I DGA' STON SPEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,)
